javadoc: An interface for listening to transactions

methods.name: transactionStarted
methods.comment: Invoked when a transaction is started.

params.name: domainObj
params.comment: the domain object where the transaction was started

methods.javadoc:
Invoked when a transaction is ended.
@param domainObj the domain object where the transaction was ended
methods.name: transactionEnded
methods.comment: Invoked when a transaction is ended.

params.name: domainObj
params.comment: the domain object where the transaction was ended

methods.javadoc:
Invoked when the stack of available undo/redo's has changed.
@param domainObj the affected domain object
methods.name: undoStackChanged
methods.comment: Invoked when the stack of available undo/redo's has changed.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that undo or redo has occured.
@param domainObj the affected domain object
methods.name: undoRedoOccurred
methods.comment: Notification that undo or redo has occured.

name: TransactionListener
comment: An interface for listening to transactions
